content.rendered:
LEADERSHIP TEAM

Meet the expert team who will deliver your workplace transformation, on time and on budget.

Rob Scott

Founder & CEO

Keith Scott

Managing Partner & Project Executive

Ben Scott

Managing Partner & CFO

Komel Saeed

Design Director, CID, WELL AP

Tim Macdonald

Director, Client Relations & Workplace Strategy

John Macdonald

Director, Project Management

Jeff Cooke

Construction Superintendent

Mike Walker

Director, Construction

Willie Cisneros

Project Supervisor

Al Lyons

Project Supervisor

Wendy Macdonald

Project Administrator

Ronan Scott

Pre-Construction

Florence Mornan

Client Relations

Kelly Claydon

VP, Strategic Partnerships

Esther Beere

Director, Human Resources & Office Services

Angie Macdonald

Administrative Assistant

Transform your workplace

Let us bring your design visions to life, seamlessly.

Get in touch
